title: Blended Mathematics Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Course Using SA Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Comprehension of Mathematical Concepts and Experience with Digital Tools
context.additional_context: Aims to develop preservice and in-service teachers' competency in designing blended mathematics pedagogy using SA tools (visualization analysis tools) in VR simulation environments

learning_goals: SA tools can visualize and analyze learners' conceptual understanding levels during the mathematics learning process.
SA tool data can be effectively integrated into project-based assessment designs in blended learning environments.
Customized instructional strategies can be developed by analyzing and utilizing process-oriented data (engagement, error patterns) via SA tools in VR simulation-based classes.

resources: Digital content library for math education

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
